heroSection.preHeading: Step into the glamour, history, and fashion of Lake Como
heroSection.subHeading: From themed Spies of Style dinners to La Dolce Vita lunches and aperitivos, each event is thoughtfully designed to delight the senses, inspire style, and tell a story

customThemeCta.description: Don't see what you're looking for? We can design a custom theme tailored to your event.
customThemeCta.title: Theme Inquiry

hero.description:
The Experience

Begin your evening with a scenic funicular ride to Brunate, offering panoramic views of Lake Como and setting the stage for intrigue. Once at our exclusive venue, you are fully immersed in a world of espionage, suspense, and interactive storytelling.

Guests will:
-Unlock a real spy mission inspired by Cecil Richard Mallaby, the daring British officer whose wartime exploits on Lake Como may have inspired Ian Fleming’s James Bond.

-Participate in interactive storylines: decode messages, track “agents,” and collaborate to complete your mission.

-Enjoy a luxurious pre-fix dinner with themed cocktails, each course revealing new plot twists.

-Dress the part or engage with props and costumes to fully inhabit the spy narrative.

-Collect curated themed kits and immersive props as keepsakes from your adventure.

Lake Como itself becomes a character: from Villa Carminati, a historic espionage hub, to Villa delle Rose, where Allied missions were coordinated, guests step directly into locations that shaped real spy history

Two Ways to Join

Weekly Turnkey Venue Dinners in Brunate
-Join scheduled evenings for a cinematic, story-driven dinner with fellow guests

-Begin your adventure with the iconic funicular ride- perfect for instagram sharing

-Small, intimate groups ensure luxury and immersion

-Access curated themed kits and collectible props for purchase

Private Villa & Event Bookings
Bring the experience to your villa, private residence, or destination event

-Fully customizable missions, props, and storylines

-Perfect for weddings, milestone celebrations, corporate gatherings, or luxury retreats

-Guests step directly into the Lake Como espionage world from the comfort of their own villa

Key Features (Both Options)

The only Bond-inspired spy adventure on Lake Como, rooted in true history

Pre-fix dinner with themed cocktails

Interactive missions, codes, and spy activities

Props and costume options for full immersion

Small group format for intimacy and luxury

Curated themed kits and collectibles available for purchase
hero.mainTitle: Experience Lake Como like never before — the only James Bond–inspired spy experience on the lake, where cinematic storytelling, interactive missions, and true espionage history come alive.
hero.preHeading: Step into the Shadows: An Immersive James Bond–Inspired Spy Adventure
hero.secondaryTitle: Fully themed, fully immersive, fully unforgettable

themesList.story: Guests step into the world of secret agents, daring missions, and intrigue. Think tuxedos, glamorous dresses, clever props, and action-packed poses.
themesList.title: Agents of Style

themesPage.title: Spies of Style Dinner Experience: The Only Bond-Inspired Spy Adventure on Lake Como

paragraphs: Choose your theme. Select your venue. Now it’s time to experience the immersive fun!
We create unforgettable experiences for groups of all sizes. Whether it’s an intimate gathering or a large celebration, our team brings your event to life with style, elegance, and flair.

Guests can choose from our exclusive 2026 themes—from the timeless glamour of La Dolce Vita, to the cinematic sparkle of Hollywood Hustle, or the sophisticated intrigue of Bond. Prefer something truly unique? We also offer custom themes, tailored to your vision and designed to make your occasion one-of-a-kind.
We provide all themed backdrops and props for Polaroid moments, with the option to personalize backdrops, giving your guests fun, memorable keepsakes.
Our events are hosted in an array of stunning venues, from exclusive wine cellars, to historic palaces, elegant gardens, and lively terraces, providing the perfect backdrop for every occasion.
To enhance the experience, we suggest guests come in themed attire, and offer the option of a pop-up fashion rack so guests can purchase curated themed styles on-site.
We also offer a variety of music options, from DJs to live singers, performing curated playlists for each theme—ensuring the soundtrack perfectly matches the mood and atmosphere.

For those who wish to capture the magic, we offer professional photography and videography, with the exclusive option to create a custom 3-minute cinematic movie trailer, complete with a personalized cast list and tailored music—bringing your immersive experience fully to life long after the event ends.
With fashion, food, and drinks at the heart of every experience, your private event on Lake Como becomes more than a celebration—it’s an immersive journey your guests will never forget.

cta.description: Immerse yourself in the theme and live the moment
cta.title: Celebrate like a Star

hero.subtitle: From intimate gatherings to full celebrations
hero.title: Designed for Celebration, Styled to Remember

hero.description:
Our 2026 themed experiences invite guests into a one-of-a-kind atmosphere on Lake Como, featuring photo-ready backdrops and a curated selection of props for spontaneous, playful photo moments. Guests are welcome to come dressed to theme or simply grab an accessory and join in. 

Signature cocktails, menus, and music guide the evening—often transforming dinner into dancing.

With candid Polaroid moments captured throughout the night, and plenty of opportunities to share your own, our weekly aperitivos and pre-fixed dinners are designed to be social, immersive, and unforgettable.
hero.heading: Seasonal Weekly Events
hero.subHeading: From Drinks to Dinner to Dancing Under the Stars

heroFeature.subtitle: Dive into the World of Cinematic Creativity
heroFeature.title: THEMED CINEMATIC PARTIES

steps.body:
Select from our signature themes: International Agents of Style, Hollywood Hussle, La Dolce Vita, Pink Ladies, Angels & Demons or create a custom theme. With over 3,000 costumes and props, your celebration can be uniquely tailored to your group. We consult with you to build any themed story - the sky is the limit with us! 

Guests may take the lead on screen, step into select moments, or simply enjoy the experience while our professional actors bring the story to life.

Whether you want to star in your own cinematic trailer or watch the drama unfold around you, the film is crafted seamlessly around your level of participation, comfort, and style.

Example Customized Storytelling – Corporate Brand Dinner Show:

A company invites key clients, partners, or employees to an exclusive dinner, either at our historic palace in the heart of Como or a venue of their choice. The evening transforms into an immersive storytelling experience, where the brand’s story is enacted through performances, cinematic content, and thematic moments woven seamlessly into the dining experience. Guests are not just observers—they actively engage with the narrative, creating a sense of participation and exclusivity.

Every detail—from costumes and props to custom backdrops and interactive set pieces—is designed to reflect the brand’s identity, creating a luxurious and memorable atmosphere. Throughout the evening, the experience is filmed as a short cinematic production, culminating in a 3-minute movie trailer that serves as a lasting memento. Experiencing the brand in such a personalized and captivating way fosters deeper connections, strengthens loyalty, and leaves an impression that extends far beyond the event itself.
steps.heading: Choose or Create Your Story

steps.body:
Decide where your cinematic experience will take place:

• Our Venue: Our Turnkey setup with cocktails, gourmet popcorn with DJ & dancing
• Luxury Hotel: Partnering with selected hotels for seamless events offering guests an exclusive experience
• Your Chosen Venue: We bring all props, costumes, step & repeat backdrops, and filming to your location. We do travel to various locations with advance requests.
• We offer 1/2 day & full day filming with boats, vespas, costumes and props for groups wanting a day group event. A perfect memorabilia and adventure for guests.

Example Concept – Lake Como Bachelor/Bachelorette Experience:

A wedding party travels to Lake Como and wants to create a truly unforgettable bachelor or bachelorette celebration. Our team designs an immersive experience, guiding guests through iconic locations across the city—capturing moments with cinematic, movie-trailer-style storytelling that feels both playful and elegant.

The experience can be tailored to fit either a half-day (4–5 hours) or a full-day (7–8 hours) journey. A half-day option allows for a focused, energetic adventure that concludes with a refined cocktail reception, while a full-day experience offers a complete narrative arc with multiple locations and interactive moments, culminating in a luxurious finale.

In both cases, the journey ends at our historic palace venue in the heart of Como. Guests enjoy an exclusive cocktail reception where highlights from the day are presented in cinematic form, all within the palace’s elegant interiors. This combination of immersive storytelling, city exploration, and a luxurious finale transforms the celebration into an experience that guests will remember—and share—long after the wedding.
steps.heading: Pick Your Location

steps.body:
Our team curates every detail to bring your theme to life. From custom step & repeat backdrops and curated props to music and storylines, we transform venues into a cinematic setting. Our stylist works directly with you to ensure all props, costumes and backdrops are ready for your film. We curate and manage a bespoke cast of professional actors who can enact the full story, should guests choose this option. You relax while we handle all the production details.

Production & Client Collaboration:

Our immersive experiences are fully collaborative, giving clients the opportunity to shape the narrative of their event from start to finish. We provide storyboards, visual mock-ups, and thematic suggestions for each scene, allowing the experience to be carefully tailored to the client’s identity and objectives.

Clients can customize performances, costumes, props, and backdrops to reflect their unique vision, ensuring every element aligns with their story. By engaging directly in the creative process, clients become active partners in the production, resulting in a one-of-a-kind immersive experience that leaves a lasting impression on participants and reinforces the brand’s connection with its audience.
steps.heading: Production Design

steps.body:
On the day of your event, guests step into a world of intrigue, glamour, and cinematic storytelling. With guidance from our production team, everyone gets to act out key scenes from your chosen theme, making the experience interactive and unforgettable. Our professional videographer captures both spontaneous and directed moments, ensuring every guest shines on camera while enjoying an elevated, immersive celebration.

No acting experience is required—guests can choose how much they want to engage in the storytelling. Some clients prefer to simply observe and enjoy the narrative as it unfolds, while others can take on lead roles and fully immerse themselves in the performances. You can take on a starring role, appear in stylish cameo moments, or relax while professional actors enact the full narrative around you. Every scene is designed to feel effortless, elegant, and unmistakably cinematic. This flexibility ensures that every participant feels comfortable and can enjoy the experience in a way that suits their personality, creating a welcoming, inclusive atmosphere while still maintaining the immersive, cinematic impact of the event.
steps.heading: The Big Day

steps.body:
Within 3–4 weeks, we deliver a beautifully produced 3-minute cinematic trailer, along with social media-ready clips. 

The cinematic trailer of the experience is fully crafted to reflect the client’s vision. Clients provide the title, cast names, and music selection, and we integrate these elements seamlessly into our cinematic production. Before the trailer is shared with guests, we confirm every element with the client to ensure it perfectly represents their story and meets their expectations. This attention to detail guarantees a polished, professional, and memorable keepsake that reinforces the impact of the immersive experience.
steps.heading: Post-Production Magic

steps.body:
Your personalized movie trailer can be treasured for years to come — the perfect way to relive the magic of your event.

The immersive event is captured and packaged as a 3-minute cinematic movie, creating a long-lasting keepsake. Clients can share the trailer virtually via Zoom or by hosting their own in-person movie screening party. This allows the event to live on far beyond the actual day, extending the impact of the immersive experience, strengthening connections with guests, and creating ongoing engagement with the brand or celebration.
steps.heading: Keep the Story Alive

hero.heading: Where Every Guest Becomes A Star
hero.subSubHeading: Our professional videographer captures your private event to create your very own 3-minute movie trailer. With custom casting, selected music, and highlights from your special event, we turn your celebration into a cinematic keepsake. The only movie experience on Lake Como, complete with social media–ready clips and your full trailer delivered within 3–4 weeks — making your event truly unforgettable!

moviePage.timeline: Delivered within 3–4 weeks from event date
moviePage.title: Star in Your Own Trailer

bio: Our founder, Dee Lasprogata has over 30 years of experience in fashion, working in New York, Los Angeles, Rome, Milan, and Lake Como. She arrived to the shores of Lake Como 20 years ago and has been back and forth ever since.

With roots in Philadelphia, Dee grew up surrounded by couture as her grandmother operated a custom gown atelier. Later, she graduated from both Vanderbilt University and the Fashion Institute of Design in New York City.

She has launched a pioneering fashion collections working with celebrities including Valentino, Stevie Wonder and Giada De Laurentiis. Over the years, her visionary work has been featured in major publications in both the USA and Italy, including People, Glamour, Io Donna, Women's Wear Daily (WWD), Fox & Friends, TG5, and Entrepreneur.
Today, Dee combines her fashion-forward sensibilities with cinematic flair to craft an unforgettable experience; she curates the wardrobe, props, and look for every guest.
crewMembers.name: Dee Lasprogata

bio: Stefano Dozza is a filmmaker, photographer, and content producer from Bologna, currently based between Milan and Rome. He has studied and worked in New York, Los Angeles, and the UK. Over the years, his work has spanned corporate and fashion projects, with each video carefully tailored to reflect the unique look and identity of each brand.

As a versatile creative professional, Stefano brings expertise in filmmaking, photography, copywriting, and podcasting to Lake Como Style. His international experience and artistic vision ensure that every cinematic experience captures the essence of Italian elegance combined with Hollywood production values.

Stefano's commitment to sustainability and thoughtful content creation aligns perfectly with Lake Como Style's mission to deliver meaningful, memorable experiences that respect both artistry and environment.
crewMembers.name: Stefano Dozza

cta.description: Create unforgettable moments on Lake Como
cta.title: Unique Venues, Unique Events For All

description:
AGENTS OF STYLE AT HOTEL TERZO CROTTO: 
Nestled in the heart of Cernobbio, Hotel Terzo Crotto is a charming historic property set in a garden‑surrounded former farmhouse dating back to the late 19th century. The hotel’s tranquil setting offers easy access to the lakeside and local attractions like Villa d’Este while maintaining a peaceful, picturesque atmosphere. With inviting outdoor spaces, wine cellar and a welcoming restaurant celebrating authentic Italian cuisine, Hotel Terzo Crotto provides an elegant backdrop for any event.

hero.subHeading: From Villas to Historic Restaurants Join Our Immersive Events

venuePage.title: 2026 Open Ticketed Experiences

faqs.answer:
Yes! We host weekly events for all guests visiting Lake Como, ranging from casual aperitivi to pre-fixed dinners at select lakeside locations. Each week offers a unique experience, allowing guests to enjoy the best of local cuisine, stunning views, and the vibrant atmosphere of the Lake.

For details on dates, times, and locations, feel free to check out our weekly events schedule.
faqs.question: Are there weekly events open to all guests visiting Lake Como?

faqs.answer: Yes! We offer private events tailored for bachelorettes, tour groups, corporate functions, and other special gatherings. Whether it’s a curated aperitivo, a pre-fixed dinner, or a full lakeside experience, we can customize the event to suit your group’s needs and create a memorable experience on Lake Como.
faqs.question: Can I book a private event for a bachelorette, rehearsal dinner or tour group gathering?

faqs.answer: We offer a collection of over 3,000 couture costumes and props, spanning multiple time periods, styles, and themes. The collection includes elegant, theatrical, historical, fantasy, and bespoke pieces, each selected for its craftsmanship, visual impact, and suitability for immersive, high-end events.
faqs.question: What backdrops and props do you offer?

faqs.answer: We recommend booking private events at least 2–4 weeks in advance to ensure availability and allow us time to tailor the experience to your group. For larger groups or peak season dates, we suggest booking as early as possible to secure your preferred date and location on Lake Como.
faqs.question: How long in advance do I need to book a private event?

faqs.answer: Yes. We offer private presentations and curated previews, either in person or virtually, allowing clients to explore themes, venues, and all backdrops and props in advance.
faqs.question: Do you offer a sneak peek of the experience before confirming a private party reservation?

faqs.answer: For our seasonal weekly events, we recommend booking at least 1–2 weeks in advance to secure your spot, as these events can fill up quickly during peak season. For larger groups or special dates, booking earlier is advised to ensure availability and the best experience on Lake Como.
faqs.question: For seasonal weekly events, how far in advance should we book?
